Quet

"It's Scourge who will said the last word in this point" said Que by 
com link (He's inside the Ark) "Tell me, MAxima, why are you 
worried??? For your fellows Decepticos??? "


--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> Maxima's optics glowed. "I don't give a damn who your 'bosses' are 
or what 
> they think! I am here, & to have any one here at the Ark is far 
too dangerous! 
> NO ONE here at the Ark! & I'll be damned if I let anyone else get 
near here!" 
> She was becoming rather frustrated with the fact that there were 
too many here 
> already. 1 was more than enough. It was her intention that she 
only show up 
> here on a rare basis to check things. Never to stay here nor let 
any one else 
> here. If it continued this way-
> 
> "If my own orders & directives & plans are underminded & over 
riden, then I 
> will take drastic measures myself!" Her anger was more than 
apparent in her 
> voice. She meant business, & if the others didn't like it being 
here at the Ark, 
> then she was mad enough to change a few things.
